name: TastyHealth
description:
Hello!
This is my first project to participate in Mini Jam.

My character likes to eat a lot and wants to be healthy :)
Help him choose the right foods and survive as long as possible.

"A" - move left;
"D" - move right;
"Space bar" - jump;

I worked on this project alone. All animations and sprites were took by free resources. 
This project was developed by UE5
